Welcome to pyraylib's documentation!
====================================

**pyraylib** is A python binding for the great C library `raylib <https://github.com/raysan5/raylib/>`_. The library provides object-oriented wrappers around raylib's struct interfaces.

Check out our :doc:`quickstart` page to get started, then see our :doc:`reference` for a detailed description of the API.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

Contents
--------

.. toctree::

   quickstart
   reference
